body:
Hello all, I am looking for videos of Avicus that I will be able to use in one of my advertisements. Note, I am not on the youtuber team but like to create ads. Hit me up on discord at Cow#4276 if you'll allow me to use them.

Like always, I never know where to put forum posts so.. one of ya moderators just fix the location if needed!

:)

*edit: the reason why I am asking for videos from ya'll is because this is a community ad showing a lot of different people

title: I am looking for videos!
